name: Hard as Hull Penetrator
description: Penetrator Head Cement is a thin standard fly tying head cement that as its name implies penetrates the thread and materials giving you a stronger fly. the Penetrator fly tying head cement comes with a brush in the cap to make application easier.

name: Clear Cure Goo Brushable
description:
The thought process behind creating the Clear Cure Goo Brushable was making a material you could use coating Crease Flies with and that it would smooth out rapidly once applied to such a fly.

The more we used this material the more uses we found for it. Perfect examples are when you are using an EZ Body fly and want to stiffen it up, or bonding mylar to foam as well as waterproofing flies such as the Ron Dong Crease Fly.

Finally how many times have you had wished you had a way to stop material from fouling without resorting to a mono loop or a wire peg. Try brusing this material lightly on DNA Fibers, Krystal Flash, Angel Hair, Sparkle Hair or any other fouling material. Bush a small amount on just past the hook bend and you will find that the Clear Cure Goo Brushable will keep the fibers out and away from the hook, but also is still very pliable and crushable.

<iframe width="200" height="173" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/QMGzJzLLFGM?list=UUb843pp0mvbAfl83gQXsRJg" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

name: Vac Rac Rod Holder
description:
Vac Rack-Magnetic

• Rounded "T" bar and shock cords allow rods to be mounted at any angle, not just in line with the base • Attaches instantly • Holds up to 4 rods • Soft bases • Soft padding for rods • Pillar mounted support for reel clearance • Rods are secured by fabric covered straps for extra security • New purpose moulded 'T' rack • Patent granted on VOD principle - Vacuum On Demand • Bonnet to roof mounting avoids the major cause of snapped rods - lifting hatchbacks and tailgates "Driving between beats with several expensive rods on the roof is always accompanied by a niggling fear that rods and car are about to part company. Any doubts should be overcome by Vac Rac's latest rod carrier, whose limpet-like grip relies on the combination of a vacuum and a flexible six inch square magnetic pad to provide a contact that is virtually impossible to break."

description:
Standard features for the Traveler Series Vises are an adjustable bobbin cradle, case harden cam jaws, rotary tension screw, a black powder coated base with a 7" stem, or a *black powder coated c-clamp with an 8" stem.

Hooks range is giving so you can utilize the True Rotary feature of this vise. The Traveler 2000 offers aluminum parts and an aluminum c-clamp.


* Traveler Value 2000 is not powder coated like it's $195.00 brother.  THIS IS A GREAT VISE FOR THE BUCK!!!

name: Baitfish Heads
description:
The Fish-Skull™ is a weighted baitfish head that has a realistic profile and is specifically designed for tying freshwater and saltwater streamer fly patterns. Quick-and-simple to tie, this latest innovation in fly tying offers fly fishermen an exciting alternative to using dumbbells or cones to weight their flies. The Fish-Skull™ has unique design features making it a very versatile platform for tying a wide variety of realistic, weighted streamer patterns using natural or synthetic fly tying materials. 

*Each pack comes with living eyes.  

8 Skulls per pack

Small-Medium is for hook sizes 4,2,1
Medium is for hook sizes 2, 1, 1/0

name: Articulated Shanks
description:
The Articulated Shank is a new fly tying material designed to simplify the tying of articulated flies.

It can be used as a simple component in different styles of articulated flies such as single-hook and two-hook articulated streamers, poppers and sliders. It is also used for streamers that use a free-swinging stinger hook.  These are amazing for making larger baitfish patterns for big Smallies.

20 per pack!

*Easy-and-fast tying process.
*Increases the overall fly length.
*Reduces the leverage a hooked fish typically places on a fly.
*Eliminates the need to “sacrifice a hook” to make a shank.

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: Craw Body
description:
CrawBody is a realistic, anatomically correct crayfish (“crawdad”) exoskeleton made of the same light-weight, synthetic suede material as the Frantic Tails. They are easy to use enabling even a novice fly tier to create simple, but effective crayfish imitations.

Each suede body is precision laser cut making each body 100% identical and with very fine detail

Medium Pack contains 8 bodies.

Q: What happens when the suede material gets wet ?

A: Once in the river, the suede fabric absorbs water, gets a little darker and takes on a very natural looking “leathery” appearance. The suede becomes softer, resulting in much more action from the free-moving crayfish claws.

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: Flash Generators
description:
The Flash Generator is made out of a extremely lightweight, flashy metal and can be used in different ways in fly design to generate a fish-enticing flash and to add a little weight to the fly. As an example, it can be positioned on the shank in front of a fly tying bead where its perfect in-line balance produces continuous movement (even when dead-drifted or on the drop) or it can be added as an appendage to other parts of your streamer to produce flash. 

Each pack contains 8 flash generators

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: Frantic Tails
description:
Frantic Tails are ultra-lightweight, bite-proof, synthetic fish-tails that can be used for almost any style of baitfish fly pattern or surface popper.  They are easy to tie with an innovative attaching method designed to give the fly maximum tail movement and help prevent fouling when casting.

Frantic Tails™ have a realistic baitfish profile offering fly fishermen a simple and effective alternative to using hackle and other traditional tail materials. They are made of an almost indestructible synthetic suede that cannot be bitten off, will not shrink and is easily colored with a permanent marker pen. Most importantly, they produce a frisky, fish-attracting tail action when fished!

The secret to the tails frantic movement is the unique design and method of attaching the tail to the hook. Instead of tying in the tail on one side of the hook like similar products, the Frantic Tail has a unique “flap” design that is used to create a “hinge” effect that positions the tail directly behind the hook shank in a balanced way. This hinge acts like a spring and generates movement from the tail with very little effort by the angler.  In addition, the hinge provides a strong, stiff connection point for the tail which virtually eliminates any fouling.

Medium for hook sizes #4, #2, #1
Large for hook sizes #1, 1/0, 2/0

8 Tials per pack in Medium
6 Tails per pack in Large

Perfect for making the CK Baitfish!

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: Living Eyes
description:
Living Eyes are the next generation of 3D fish eyes for fly tying.

Using the latest in photo-realistic holographic technology, We have developed the most realistic range of 3D fish-eyes for fly tying on the planet at a very compelling price point. No longer will fly tiers have to rely on fish eyes created using an “artist’s impression” of what they think fish eyes look like.

      We have created 4 different eye styles (colors) using high resolution images of real baitfish eyes. We call them EARTH (Green/Brown), WIND (Gold), FIRE (Red/Orange) and ICE (Silver) and together these colors will cover the vast majority of  freshwater and saltwater baitfish that fly fishermen try to imitate.

There are 20 eyes in the 5mm, 6mm & 7mm packs and 16 eyes in the big 8.5mm & 10mm packs

name: Sculpin Helmet
description:
The Sculpin Helmet is an exciting, new style of Fish-Skull™ with a realistic, flat and broad profile that imitates common bottom-dwelling fish species such as sculpins, gobies and baby catfish.
 
Designed for use on both hook and tube flies, it allows anglers to easily tie weighted streamers that fish deep and imitate these popular predator food sources.

8 heads and 3D eyes included!

name: RIO Smallmouth Fly Line
description:
It is finally here!  After a few seasons of our guides beating up the prototypes we have the finished product in hand.  I feel this is the finest Smallmouth Bass line ever made.  The line is designed for casters.  It is very accurate for picking apart a shoreline and carrying a ton of line in the air.  I also am excited about the super hard coating for fishing it in warm climates.  Let's face it, hot weather=great smallmouth fishing.  Old lines turn into a puddle in the heat.

RIO's Description:

RIO's Smallmouth Bass line has been designed for the specific demands of the smallmouth fly fisher; featuring a unique taper design that loads a rod at close range, a medium length powerful front taper that is ideal for casting smallmouth flies and a long back taper to smooth out the casting loop and keep the line stable on long shots.  A very unique handling section at the back of the head gives anglers increased mending ability and line control at range.  It is the perfect line for smallmouth bass when accurate presentations are important.  A hard coating over a medium stiff core results in a fly line that will not wilt in the heat, while RIO's XS Technology keeps the line super slick for fast long casts.  The line also features RIO's Dual Tone that allows anglers to easily find the line's loading area.  A welded loop in both ends makes it very easy and fast to rig.

name: Fat Albert
description:
The guys at the shop were introduced to dead drift terrestrial fishing for big bass by Jack Allen.  Jack fishes with the shop each year with small rods and this style of fly.  It hits the water without making a disturbance and its wiggly legs drive fish nuts.  The fly sits in the film and will float forever.  One of Tim's favorites last season. 

 <object width="200" height="173">

name: Obe-Wan
description: This is another of the shops best shallow water flies. When selective big bass are cruising the shallows, this is a perfect choice. Fish this fly by just wiggling the legs. High vis foam on top makes it a breeze to see on the water.

name: Smallmouth tape measure sticker
description: The guides at Tight Lines have always held the 20 inch river Smallmouth the true bar for a trophy fish. Keep your friends honest with this great tool. Finally a tape measure that is accurate and will hold up the the suns powerful rays. We have these made with a very powerfull adhesive and special UV vinyl for years of bleach free use.

name: Pocket Bug Box
description:
This box uses foam on the top and bottom to double your storage.  This is a perfect size for a chest/fanny pack or a rain coat pocket.  The space between the foam is big enough not to crush hair bugs or long fibered flies.  

*Dimensions and Weight
8.27" x 5.12" x 1.97" - 3.4oz

name: Smallmouth Guide Selection
description:
This is an assortment of flies our guides would not ever be without.  Tight Lines compiled this comprehensive selection to get you on the river with all the right stuff.  The box is double sided slit foam with a 2' gap between to protect fragile hair flies.  

Kit includes

*Murdich Minnow Gray and Chart.
*Couch Minnow Black, Blue, Chart
*Bart-O Minnow
*Clouser Minnows
*Tim's Muppet
*Menominee Mud Bug
*Whitlock Swimming Baitfish
*Dahlberg Divers
*Ham Sandwich
*Whit's Dragon Fly
*Shenandoah Popper-damsel blue
*Block Head Poppers
*Boogle Bugs
*Hard head rubber leg poppers

name: Tight Lines Pocket Box Selection
description:
This is a pocket sized box with 13 of our favorite smallmouth bugs.  This is your basic selection of the best stuff.  Logo box with double sided foam that won't crush precious hair bugs.

Kit Includes-

*Hard head rubber leg poppers
*Ham Sandwich
*Block Head popper
*Couch Minnow
*Murdich Minnows
*Bart-O Minnow
*Menominee Mudbug
*Clouser Minnows

name: Tight Lines Top 4
description:
This is a sample our four best.  Top water, baitfish patterns and dredgers.  A great way to get you feet wet.

Kit includes

*FREE fly box
*Boogle Bug
*Murdich Minnow
*Menominee Mud Bug
*Yellow leg bugger

name: Smallmouth fly shop decal 12" x 5"
description: Wave the smallmouth flag with these high quality vinyl decals.  Designed for easy application, durable adhesive and years of durability.

name: Smallmouth fly shop decals 5" x 2"
description: Wave the smallmouth flag with these high quality vinyl decals. Designed for easy application, durable adhesive and years of durability

name: Crease Fly
description:
The crease fly is a great bait fish pattern thats movements in the water are all over the map.  The fly is a bit spendy in price because it is airbrushed foam and epoxy coated.  A value for the amount of work that goes into this bug.  

*Guide tip:  Use the RIO Streamer tip or versi leaders to get the most out of this pattern.  If the fly is pulled under,  the action is increased a bunch!

name: Todd's Wiggle Minnow
description:
Crazy action in the water.  A little tricky to fish at first.  Make sure the tip of the fly rod is in the water and make a long smooth strip.  This will make the bug wobble like crazy.  The eats are usually explosive on the pattern. 

This is a video comparison of a thunder stick and a wiggle minnow.   Wow wiggle minnow's are awesome!
<iframe src="http://player.vimeo.com/video/14755499?title=0&byline=0&portrait=0" width="200" height="173" frameborder="0"></iframe>

name: Hair Mouse
description: Another great mouse patten.  This one is tied with zonkered muskrat to give it an amazingly life-like look.

name: Mouse Rat
description: This mouse pattern is almost unsinkable.  Great for waking or pounding along deep grassy banks.

name: Guida's Mirrored Minnow
description:
This is a great little streamer.  Flash in the body and great barring on the wing.  

Watch how a smallmouth eats baitfish! 
<object width="2--" height="175">
<param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/jhow988oqmU&hl=en&fs=1&rel=0&color1=0x2b405b&color2=0x6b8ab6"></param>

wmode="transparent"></embed>

name: Whitlock Crystal Dragon Fly
description: This pattern fished dead drift can be deadly.  We have taken numbers of large fish mid river on the Crystal Dragon.  The trick to fishing this fly is to use floatant on both the fly line and fly to keep it floating high.  Cast it out and keep the rod tip close to the water.  Twitch ever so slightly to make the wings wiggle.

name: Dragon/Damsel Adult Sz. 6
description:
The dragon and damsel flies have become very important to our guide staff.  This is a great pattern because it floats high and could represent both dragons or big damsel flies.  Fish these when you see mid river risers, grass bank edges or mid river weed mats that damsels collect on. 

*Fishing note-We have found that many times large smallies will simply sip these flies in.  It is amazing to see a huge bass take a dragon or damsel like a cutthroat trout.  The takes can be subtle so stay focused on the fly.

name: Whitlock's Spent Dragon/Damsel
description: This fly is tied entirely out deer hair and is perfect for flat water.

name: Ham Sandwich
description:
Top water spitting bug.  This is another one of Tight Lines Guide Nelson Ham's flies.  Easy to cast and a large profile make this a fantastic top water fly.

Watch this technique for poppers on rivers!

name: Ross Essence FS Rod  FREE SHIPPING ON THIS ROD
description:
The Essence® FS is a great casting rod at an entry level price! This 4-piece rod series casts like a dream and offers value-minded anglers the opportunity to fish with a quality fly rod that casts like rods costing hundreds of dollars more. The Essence FS proprietary R1 graphite design is a medium-fast action taper that is smooth, sensitive and precise; perfect for any casting style. And different from most value priced fly rods, the Essence FS series rods cast effortlessly, making it easier for beginning anglers to learn the sport of fly fishing. The Essence FS fly rods are built with the same commitment to quality, performance and dependability that we build into all of our fly rods, so you can be confident that you are getting a terrific rod at an incredible price.

The Essence® FS rod series comes with the following standard features:

■Ross proprietary R1 graphite design
■Medium-fast action rod taper, perfect for any casting style
■4-piece design - great for travel
■Smooth casting, sensitive and precise
■Titanium oxide, super strong guides
■Rod piece alignment dots
■Anodized aluminum reel seat
■Half wells handle (3wt. - 6wt.), full wells handle with 
fighting butt (6wt. and up)
■Cordura rod case
■Lifetime warranty

name: Ross Essence FC Rod FREE SHIPPING ON THIS ROD
description:
FREE SHIPPING ON THIS ROD

The Essence® FC fly rod series is our mid-range rod line. This 4-piece series is a perfect blend of impeccable casting performance, eye-catching aesthetics and reserved power. The Essence FC has a deep brown finish with well-appointed gold and maroon accents. The cosmetics are further enhanced with a beautiful nickel-plated reel seat and an engineered walnut insert. The Essence FC proprietary R2 graphite design is a medium-fast action taper that is perfect for carrying line effortlessly when making short, medium and long distance casts. These are smooth casting rods that are sensitive and precise; without compromising on strength or integrity. The Essence FC is a great series of fly rods that any angler will be proud to own!

The Essence® FC rod series comes with the following standard features:
■Ross proprietary R2 graphite design
■Medium-fast action rod taper, perfect for any casting style
■4-piece design - great for travel
■Smooth casting, sensitive and precise
■Titanium oxide, super strong guides
■Rod piece alignment dots
■Nickel-plated reel seat with engineered walnut insert (3wt. - 6wt.), 
anodized aluminum reel seat (7wt. and up)
■Half wells handle (3wt. - 6wt.), full wells handle with 
fighting butt (6wt. and up)
■Cordura rod case
■Lifetime warranty

name: Redington Predator-FREE SHIPPING
description: The Predator Series is for anglers searching for a stout, Fast Action fly rod to help deliver large flies in tough conditions. These are solid fly rods when targeting under heavy brush or getting tight to banks. Also great rods for fishing from kayaks, canoes or pontoons. FEATURES *Fast action *Carbon fiber weave in butt section and at ferrules for improved strength & durability *54 and 42 million modulus, Red.Core blank *Anodized machined aluminum reel seat *Durable oversized guides, titanium oxide ring, robust for saltwater & for shooting line for extra distance *Guides: Gun smoke frame snake and stripping guides, titanium oxide ring *Come with fabric rod tube with dividers 3 difference sizes of fighting butts on the various line weights, best matching the size of the rod, per the application *Machined hidden hook keepers at reel seat *Alignment dots for easy rod set up *Lifetime Warranty

name: Sage Approach Rods FREE SHIPPING ON THIS ROD
description:
*FREE SHIPPING ON THIS ROD

Sage Approach Rods

EXCELLENT LINE FEEL AND CONTROL IN A MEDIUM FAST ACTION

Calling our all-new Approach series rods "entry level" just doesn't do them justice. Utilizing a higher modulus graphite than any of our previous entry-level rods, the Approach has a medium-fast action that provides excellent line feel and control. Beginning casters can easily grow with this rod without ever feeling they've outgrown it. And like all Sage rods, the Approach is made right here on Bainbridge Island, Washington, USA.

FEATURES

*Medium-fast action
*Oyster Shell shaft color
*Ceramic stripper guide
*Hard chrome snake guides and tip-top
*Reverse half-wells grip on freshwater weights
*All aluminum reel seat with full-wells grip and cork fighting butt on all saltwater models
*Silver gray rod tube with divided liner

name: Sage Response Rod FREE SHIPPING ON THIS ROD
description:
FREE SHIPPING ON THIS ROD

USA BUILT!

PREMIUM, UPGRADED MATERIALS IN A FAST ACTION TAPER

At Sage, our never-ending mantra to improve performance is on full display in our all-new Response series rods. The combination of proven tapers and premium materials has resulted in this family of notably smooth casting, fast-action rods. Dressed with stylish wraps and other upgrades, the Response is an aptly named fishing machine that follows your lead.

FEATURES
*Fast action
*Brown primary thread wraps with Black and Gold tip wraps
*Ceramic stripper guide
*Hard chrome snake guides and tip-top
*Rosewood insert and aluminum reel seat for freshwater weights
*Reverse half-wells grip on freshwater weights
*All aluminum reel seat with full-wells grip and fighting butt for *saltwater weights
*Brown CORDURA® rod tube

name: Sage Bass 2 Rod- FREE SHIPPING
description:
When you’re casting big flies onto weed mats to trigger attacks from the bass below, you’re in for a day of spectacular strikes and big memories—maybe even a tournament title. New for 2012, the Bass II rods have been upgraded for faster line speed to carry big, bulky flies straight to their target—everything from explosive smallmouth in their river lairs, to voracious snook and tarpon stealthfully pulled from the mangroves on your kayak. The new Peacock model joins this year’s lineup, a true heavyweight ready to go toe-to-toe with giant Muskie, Pike and Peacock Bass. 

Features:

*Fast action
*Graphite IIIe construction
*Built within tournament specifications
*Fuji ceramic stripping guides
*Hard chromed snake guides
*Saltwater safe, red anodized aluminum reel seat
*Custom, pre-shaped cork handle 6½” full-wells grip
*Fighting butt
*Olive ballistic cloth rod/reel case
*Sage BASS II taper line included

name: Sage Xi3 FREE SHIPPING ON THIS ROD
description:
FREE SHIPPING ON THIS ROD!

This rod was designed for saltwater but has become a staple in our boats for smallmouth.  Smooth action for popping bugs and plenty of but section to set the hook.  Large guides allow for long casts and total control.

What Sage says:

Through our exclusive SaltH2O Technology, Xi3 rods provide a groundbreaking level of torque and torsion resistance for superior tracking and less wasted energy at all distances. SaltH2O’s unique layer interface and proprietary resin also combine for maximum strength—even in high heat environments—and significantly less weight.

This increased strength comes in handy when you need to lean on powerful saltwater bruisers. Just as importantly, it gives you the backbone to pick up 60 or 70 feet of line on desperate second (and last) chance casts. 

Our G5 construction adds improved line feel for easier, more intuitive casting, and specialized saltwater-specific components complete the package. In other words, the new Xi3 is everything you need to make that first shot count.

name: Sage One-FREE SHIPPING
description: Accuracy starts with your eyes. It ends with the fly in front of theirs. *Tim's favorite new Smallmouth rod. 9 foot 7 wt. ONE The ONE rod is our flagship offering that may redefine the “all-around” rod category, where precision casting accuracy is needed over a wide range of conditions. Hand crafted from our Konnetic technology three long years in the making, the ONE rod is a game changer. Your game. Its fast action incorporates a built in sweet spot, making the ONE rod the ideal choice for experienced and aspiring casters alike. Features: -Fast action -Konnetic Technology construction -Fuji ceramic stripping guides -Hard chromed snake guides -High grade, custom tapered, shaped cork handles -Weights 6 through 10 have an all Golden Bronze colored aluminum anodized reel seat -Black powder coated aluminum rod tube with Sage medallion

name: Ross Fly Start Reel
description:
*This is a great place to start in a fly reel.  Ross quality at a reasonable price. The # 4 works great on 7 and 8 weight bass rods.
<object width="210" height="175">
<param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/YHoRUe_F8A8&hl=en_US&fs=1&rel=0&color1=0x2b405b&color2=0x6b8ab6"></param>
<param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param>
<param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param>
<param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param>
<embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/YHoRUe_F8A8&hl=en_US&fs=1&rel=0&color1=0x2b405b&color2=0x6b8ab6" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="200" height="175"
wmode="transparent"></embed>
</object>

The Flystart is a hybrid large arbor fly reel that is affordably priced, yet built with the same commitment to quality and performance as all Ross reels. The drag system is dependable and smooth with a wide range of adjustment. Fly fishing is a sport that everyone can enjoy, but for many people, the price of fly tackle is often a barrier to participation. The Ross team was committed to producing an introductory priced fly reel that would still perform to the expectations of even the most experienced angler, and the Flystart series perfectly meets this goal. You will be amazed with its quality in manufacturing tolerance, drag performance and durability. The Flystart is a great reel for the first-time fly fishing participant that demands quality, but does not want to spend a fortune gearing up to fish.


The Flystart series come with the following standard features:


*Manufactured out of high quality pressure-fed cast aluminum with a machined finish 
*Self-lubricating, synthetic drag system that is virtually maintenance free 
*Electrostatically coated with aerospace grade polyurethane for the perfect balance of hardness and color 
*Seamless transition between line-in and drag engagement 
(no start-up friction) 
*Quick release locking spool 
*Easy left-hand to right-hand retrieve conversion 
*Exposed spool rim for palming 


FRAME/SPOOL MATERIAL High quality aluminum alloy

MANUFACTURING SPECIFICATIONS Pressure-fed cast aluminum, 1 piece frame, 
2 piece assembled spool, machine finished

DRAG MATERIAL Delrin 500P - space-age polymer that is durable, heat resistant, 
self-lubricating and maintenance free

DRAG ENGAGEMENT SYSTEM Delrin 500P interface - offset gear-to-gear 
disc drag engagement

ESCAPEMENT SYSTEM Radial pawl engagement

SPOOL ROTATION MECHANISM Oil impregnated bronze bushing rotating on a stainless steel spindle

FINISH Aerospace grade polyurethane

NUMBER OF REELS IN SERIES 4

FLY ROD COVERAGE 3wt. - 8wt.

FISHING APPLICATION Designed for use in all freshwater and 
warmwater fishing environments

name: Ross Flyrise Reel
description:
The Flyrise is a hybrid large arbor fly reel that is beautifully crafted with cosmetic innovation and precision workmanship. The drag system is identical to the system used in the award winning Rhythm USA reel series. This is pretty impressive considering that the Rhythm sold for more than twice the price of this incredible new series! The drag adjustment is precise and sensitive - capable of protecting the lightest tippets even when battling world-class fish. To guarantee the level of dependability anglers have come to expect from all Ross products, the drag is a triple redundancy system; providing three backup systems for dependable performance under the most demanding fishing conditions. The Flyrise has also been fitted with our newest drag knob design that delivers smooth rotation, infinite adjustments and secure settings. The Flyrise truly is a premier reel at an incredible price!

The Flyrise series come with the following standard features:

*Manufactured out of high quality pressure-fed cast aluminum with a machined finish 
*Self-lubricating, synthetic drag system that is virtually maintenance free 
*Electrostatically coated with aerospace grade polyurethane for the perfect balance of hardness and color 
*Seamless transition between line-in and drag engagement 
(no start-up friction) 
*Quick release locking spool 
*Easy left-hand to right-hand retrieve conversion 
*Exposed spool rim for palming 

FRAME/SPOOL MATERIAL High quality aluminum alloy

MANUFACTURING SPECIFICATIONS Pressure-fed cast aluminum, 1 piece frame, 
2 piece assembled spool, machine finished

DRAG MATERIAL Delrin 500AF with impregnated Teflon - space-age polymer that is durable, heat resistant, self-lubricating and maintenance free

FISHING APPLICATION Designed for use in all freshwater and 
warmwater fishing environments

name: Ross CLA Fly Reel
description:
<object width="200" height="175">
<param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/rxdpM5TOa8M&hl=en_US&fs=1&rel=0&color1=0x2b405b&color2=0x6b8ab6" />
<param name="allowFullScreen" value="true" />
<param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always" />
<param name="wmode" value="transparent" />
<embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/rxdpM5TOa8M&hl=en_US&fs=1&rel=0&color1=0x2b405b&color2=0x6b8ab6" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="200" height="175" wmode="transparent" />
</object>

The CLA has set the standard for affordable, hybrid large arbor fly reels. The CLA series incorporates a superior drag mechanism that is extraordinarily smooth, heat resistant and provides incredible stopping power. While the CLA is offered at a reasonable price, no options have been overlooked. Each reel in this series is designed with a unique diameter and width to maximize the properties of drag consistency and quick line retrieval. The CLA has become our dealers' favorite for anglers that are looking for an American made, high quality, reasonably priced fly reel.

CLA 4-7 (Larger Components for Bigger Fish!)
The mechanical design of all CLA reels is consistent throughout the series, but improvements have been made to the four largest sizes to support their use in battling bigger fish. The CLA (sizes 4-7) have a larger sized drag knob, handle and spool cap, but most importantly, they have a STRONGER DRAG SYSTEM. To ensure smooth performance with fast-running fish, the four larger sized CLA reels have also been equipped with oil-impregnated bushings for improved spool rotation. The frame and spool have been reinforced to eliminate flexing when battling the "big boys." With a wide range of sizes available, the CLA series is appropriate for any fishing application. And because of its great size, dependability, drag performance and affordable price, the CLA (sizes 4-7) have become one of the most popular Spey series on the market today.


FRAME/SPOOL MATERIAL 6061-T6 proprietary aluminum alloy

name: Ross Evolution LT
description:
This is one of the finest reels we have ever used.

The Evolution® LT is unquestionably one of the lightest fly reels ever produced. This large arbor fly reel is a machining masterpiece and the lightest in its class. The Evolution LT is fitted with an aluminum spool cap, aluminum drag knob and aluminum escapement cover. Our customers have been asking for more metal in their fly reel and that is exactly what you are going to get! To keep the weight in check with these improvements, we have also added ventilation to the spool and the frame, allowing for the addition of metal components with no measurable weight increase. This series is designed for those anglers who appreciate both art and function. The cosmetic innovation and precision workmanship of the Evolution LT series is only surpassed by its drag system which is precise and sensitive - capable of protecting the lightest tippets even when battling world-class fish. To guarantee the level of dependability consumers have come to expect from all Ross products, the Evolution LT series has been designed with a triple redundancy drag system, providing three backup systems to ensure dependability under the most demanding conditions.

name: Lamson Konic
description:
WOW!  This is the best deal we have going.  The Lamson Konic is a perfect reel for a perfect price.
     
New for 2008, Konic delivers smart design and high performance in Lamson's most affordable reel. The same super-smooth, fully sealed conical drag system and stainless roller clutch used in our more expensive reels are matched with machined components and pressure cast ALDC12 aluminum alloy spool and frame. Konic is anodized then finished with a 100% solid polyurethane coating to resist gouging and abrasion. Affordable reels just got a whole lot better.

name: Rio Power Fly
description:
Rio Power Fly

POWER FLY
New for 2013. Designed to cast large, air resistant and heavy flies with exceptional ease.

RIO's Power Fly has been specifically designed to cast large and heavy flies with exceptional ease. The line features a short, powerful front taper that has no problem casting weighted streamers, large terrestrial patterns and nymph and indicator rigs. The line is heavier than the industry standard to load modern rods with ease, and is built with a supple, coldwater coating that features RIO's XS and AgentX technologies for the very best in performance. 

Short, powerful front taper to easily cast large flies

Slightly heavier than the AFTMA standard to load powerful rods

XS Technology for a super slick coating

Welded loops for fast rigging

name: RIO Streamer Tip
description:
StreamerTip Fly Line

*This is the lines we use alot with the Bart-O Minnow, Murdich and Whitlock swimming baitfish.  A must have for big bass streamers.

A floating line with a 9.5 ft clear intermediate tip, this is an excellent line for fishing streamers in fall as well as for nymph and chironomid fishing on lakes. The clear tip sinks at  1.5 – 2 ips, perfect for just under the surface or on windy days where a floating line will lose contact with the fly. Built on a Clouser taper it’s fantastic for casting big streamers or teams of flies and for managing wind. The single-strand Powerflex core with coldwater coating provides high line speed for maximum distance and the highest casting performance. Also includes the RIO welded loop on the front end for easy rigging. 

WF4F/I – WF8F/I | Length: 100 ft (30.5 m) | Color: Yellow / Clear Tip

name: Sharkskin GPX
description:
Sharkskin Series

With cutting-edge angling technology that is revolutionizing the sport, the Sharkskin Series provides the ultimate casting experience. Sharkskin allows you to cast further with less effort and with less line tangling--elevating your fly fishing experience to a whole new level. Featuring 3M's proprietary microreplication technology, Sharkskin is a radical modification of typically smooth-surfaced fly lines. Its micro textured surface traps air to provide superior shootability and floatation while eliminating line flash and vastly reducing friction. All of this comes with the added benefit of increased durability allowing the line to last up to twice as long. Due to its increased surface area, Sharkskin lines sit higher in the water offering less drag, easier mending, roll casting, pick-ups and less water spray. The floating lines in this series also feature 3M's proprietary AST and Dry Tip technologies.

name: SA GPX
description:
Floating Specialty Taper

*Half-size heavy, performs well with fast action rods
*Front tip section has improved floatation (Dry Tip Technology)
*Taper designed to throw a variety of fly sizes
*Optimized for cold to temperate water
*Braided multifilament core, low stiffness, moderate delivery

name: Rio Bass Leaders
description:
Knotless freshwater bass tapered leaders.

RIO's bass leaders are designed and built to match the needs of the bass fly fisher. The leaders are made of a medium stiff nylon and have a powerful taper design that will easily turn over large flies, and cope with tough winds. The copolymer material is incredibly tough and abrasion resistant.

*Medium-stiff material for turning over larger flies
*Powerful butt section and taper for great turnover
*Maximum strength and abrasion resistance

Ideal for:

Weighted Streamers
Bass Bugs
Poppers

  
*Guide tip

The rivers of the midwest are very tannin colored.  Our guides use the Rio Bass leader and cut 2 1/2 feet off the tippet and replace it with Maxima Chameleon tippet.  This color blends in perfectly to our rivers and is very abrasion resistant.

name: Sink Tip Leader-Versi Leader
description:
Freshwater Versi Leader

This is the 7 ft Versi Leader that turns the Clouser line into a sink tip.  Just connect this loop to loop, add two feet of tippet and you are on the bottom.  We use these a ton when fishing the Murdich Minnow, Barto and mostly for Whitlocks swimming baitfish.  This allows us to get down a little deeper on the ledges.

7 ft (2.1 m) sinking leaders with a high tenacity nylon core coated with a super low modulus tungsten polymer mixture. VersiLeaders feature an ultra smooth welded loop in the butt end making it easy to connect to the fly line. 


Strength: 12lb

name: Blue Sky Furled Leaders
description:
These are the Original BlueSky Furled Tapered Leaders. 

*This is a great leader to help turn over those big flies!  Simply attach the leader to your fly line with a loop to loop connection and add 3 feet of 10lb maxima and you are ready to fish.

Born on the storied chalk streams of the British Isles, furled leaders were first crafted of horse hair and later of silk imported from the Far East. Now they are hand-woven from over 90 feet of premium nylon, providing legendary performance. 

All of our leaders are hand-crafted and are pre-looped to attach to the fly line using the simple loop-to-loop method. This means if the conditions change, or you wish to use a different fishing method, you can switch to another BlueSky leader in seconds.

name: Powerflex Tippet
description:
Powerflex Tippet

A high tenacity copolymer with excellent knot strength, abrasion-resistance, stretch and suppleness. Sometimes called double strength nylon. Used for all species, the light gray provides superb camouflage in any sub-aquatic environment. Powerflex has the perfect combination of elongation and tenacity, and we will match it against any competing brand any time.

name: Maxima Tippet 27 yard spool
description:
*This is the shops favorite tippet material.  Many of our guides prefer the Chameleon color to match the tannen waters of NE Wisconsin.  Super tough stuff

Maxima's proven, tough, high durability finish is the key. It means Maxima will fish stronger, fish longer than any other monofilament. So while Maxima may cost a little more, you can fish a lot more with every spool.

Plus, this finish holds a knot better than any other brand, reducing knot slippage -- a major cause of knot failure -- to near zero. 

Just as important, Maxima's tough finish also results in unparalleled resistance to incidental nicks, 
crapes and chafing.

name: Maxima Tippet 110 yard spool
description:
*This is the shops favorite tippet material.  Many of our guides prefer the Chameleon color to match the tannen waters of NE Wisconsin.  Super tough stuff

Maxima's proven, tough, high durability finish is the key. It means Maxima will fish stronger, fish longer than any other monofilament. So while Maxima may cost a little more, you can fish a lot more with every spool.

Plus, this finish holds a knot better than any other brand, reducing knot slippage -- a major cause of knot failure -- to near zero. 

Just as important, Maxima's tough finish also results in unparalleled resistance to incidental nicks, 
crapes and chafing.

name: Shenandoah Chugger
description: The Shenandoah Chugger is a great all around popping bug.  It has a big had and makes a great pop.  The tail is short with a rubber legs that can be cut off to make the fly appear smaller in skinny water.  We use these on a regular basis.

name: Whitlock Waker
description: This has been a pattern that the shop was not able to get until this season!  The Whitlock Waker is a great top water baitfish that pushes a ton of water.  The fly comes with a small mono weed post so you can throw it tight into cover.  These are about as perfect as I have seen for a spun head fly.

name: Floating Minnow
description:
This is a floating minnow tied with EP Fibers.  The head has foam discs hidden by the minnow fiber for bouyancy.  This patterns floats on the surface and has a great wounded baitfish look.   Our favorite way to fish this fly is with the RIO streamer tip line (see fly lines) or a heavy sink tip and a short amount of leader section.  This will bring the fly below the surface and make a very erratic action.

name: Galloup's Dungeon
description: This is an articulated fly that has tons of action in the water.  The head is spun deer hair.  This is a bit clumsy to cast all day but has been a great fly for moving large smallies.

name: Whitlock's Matuka Sculpin
description: These are some of the most beautiful flies in our bins at the shop.  Perfectly tied.  These fish best on a RIO sink tip and a short piece of Maxima tippet.

name: Swimming Baitfish
description:
This is Dave Whitlock's Swimming Baitfish.  This is one of the best flies we sell for huge bass.  This is best fished on a sink tip line with a short leader.  The spun deer hair head gives the fly incredible action when it is stripped.  A must have for our guides.

Watch the Swimming Baitfish underwater

name: Whitlock's Scorpion
description: The Whitlock's Scorpion is a great warmwater attractor pattern. It is weedless, has lead eyes for weight and rubber legs and tail for incredible motion.  Great day in and day out pattern for searching deeper water.

name: Worm Slider
description: This is our answer to the rubber worm.  These get down deep and have tons of action.  The perfect fly for fishing deep pools slow.

name: Angel Fly-Sparkle Minnow
description:
This is a great small baitfish pattern.  Very easy to cast on a small rod.  We use this fly to fish through riffles and deep pockets.
<iframe width="200" height="173" src="http://www.youtube.com/embed/6xLdoqCVhWU" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen></iframe>

description:

description:
This crawfish has foam pinchers attached with rubber legs.  The fly is weighted in the rear making it flee naturally on the retrieve.  This is a fantastic crawfish pattern that looks and acts natural in the water.

Watch how a smallmouth spins a crayfish around to eat it with the pinchers out!

name: Trick or Treat
description: Another great fly for getting down deep.

name: Yellow Yummy
description: What is not to like about this bug.  It is yellow, enough said.

name: Tequeely Streamer
description: The Tequeely has become a favorite pattern for the smallmouth guides of NW Wisconsin.  Gold bead, yellow rubber legs and copper chenille body, what more do you want?

name: Clouser Minnow
description: The Clouser minnow is and always will be a classic standby fly.  Great for getting down deep quick.

name: Tim's Moppet
description:
A deep dredging fly with lots of action.  Medium size dumbell eyes get the fly down to the fish and the rabbit strip in a dubbing loop adds movement.

Watch Tim tie the Tim's Moppet

name: Basic bug box
description: This is a hinged lid box 4' * 3 1/2   That can hold a handful of bugs.  Simple and it wont smash your flies.

name: Tight Lines Erie Bug Box
description:
Great boat bag box!  Lots of storage with double sided slit foam and good space between the foam.  I can get 2 or 3 of these in a boat bag.  Buy two, one for top water and one for subsurface flies.
