name: Tight Lines Ontario Bug Box
description:
This box is great for in a boat or a larger gear bag.  One size larger than the popular Erie.  Still a very usable size with lots of space for more bugs.

Dimensions and Weight
9.61" x 6.34 " x 2.60 " - 11oz

name: Tight Lines Superior Bug Box
description:
This box is a giant.  This is by far the guides favorite box.  Double sided slit foam.  One side for top water other side for sub-surface patterns.  

*Dimensions and Weight
13.39" x 10.83" x 3.27 " - 22oz

name: Deluxe Stripping Guards
description:
*Protecting you and your fly line!
The Stripee advantage

Extends the life of your fly line 
Protects your fingers from burns

*Cleans and conditions your line 
*Removes 'memory' from your line 
*Better cast ability and presentation 
*Comfortable to wear and easy to use 
*Convenient and time saving 
*Reusable and washable
 *Stripee adds a new dimension to finger protection. You can protect yourself and your fly line while fishing and maintain a clean line while fishing because they are comfortable to wear.



Stripee's come in one color (tan) 

Sizes: Medium, Large, Extra-Large

name: Tool Lanyard
description:
We have tried dozens of different lanyards in the past.  These are by far the finest we have ever used.  Combine this with a hip or chest pack and leave that old vest at home.  The neck cord is made of nylon coated stainless cable that holds its form.  In the prespawn video the shop did this is the lanyard Bart has on.  Assorted colors.

*Quick release(so you don't strangle yourself)
*Tippet holder
*Drying patch
*Retractor

name: RIO Versi Tip Fly Line
description:
*This is a great line that will cover all conditions! 

VERSITIP II

New for 2013. A powerful, interchangeable tip fly line, designed for the travelling angler.

Each line comes with a selection of interchangeable tips that allow anglers to switch tips as fishing and water conditions change. A unique mending and handling section at the back end of the head enables anglers to mend effectively and control the the fly fishes at range. Ultra strong, slim welded loops on the front of each tip makes for super-fast rigging. A loop on the front end allows angers to change rigs quickly. Built with a supple coldwater coating , this line will not tangle off the reel.

Each line is packaged with four 15ft tips:

*Floating
*Clear Intermediate (1.5 - 2ips)
*Type 3 Sink (3 - 4ips)
*Type 6 sink (6 - 7ips)

name: Scissors Clamp
description: This is a great clamp because it has a scissors, flat jaws and is long enough to get a hook out of a big bass or a pikes mouth.  This is a mandatory for fishing.  All Stainless steel!

name: Mitten Clamp
description: The mitten clamp allows you to get ahold of the hook and lock the clamp with one hand.  This is the guides favorite clamp to have.  It allows us to remove a deep hook without bleeding the fish.

name: Mitten Scissors Clamp
description: The same clamp as the Mitten Clamp with the a scissors built in on the jaw.  I think this is the best clamp available.  You can cut leader material, fly lines, and degorge hooks all with one tool.

name: Barb Crusher
description: Big game hooks can be difficult to remove the barb with a standard hemo.  We found the barb crusher will push down a 4/0 stainless hook with ease.  Practice catch and release and remove barbs on all your smallmouth flies.

name: Pisces Pliers
description: Every Smallouth angler needs a good pliers.  The Pisces is a great tool without spending an arm and a leg.  The Pisces plier has a striated jaw design, anvil cutters, rubber grips, coiled lanyard and a two-pocket holster.

name: Diamond Grit Hook Files
description: This hook file is double sided with dual sharpening grooves.  The file is stainless steel with a diamond surface.  We sell it in two sizes so you can have one with you and one on your boat bag.  Great files that will take off enough material on hard hooks.  The 4" has a fine/med grit and the 6" has a med/Heavy grit.

name: Crayfish Hop Indicators
description:
This is the best indicator we have found for crayfish hopping.  This technique truly works best with the indicator.  I can be difficult to detect a strike without it and the indicator helps suspend the fly.

The technique requires you to fish with a longer leader and attaching an indicator close to the fly line.  The fly is presented down and across with the fly getting directly to the bottom.  When the fly has reached the bottom a hopping motion is added.  Deadly for deep fish.  This indicator will support a heavy fly without sinking.  

Benefits:

*Highly visable
*Bouyant enough to keep heavy flies from sinking the indicator
*Easy moves up and down on the leader to adjust to differnt depths

name: Smallmouth Boat Patch
description: This is an adhesive backed boat patch that is perfect for storing recently used bugs.  It is preslit and has a good adhesive on the back side.

name: Small Bug Kit
description:
*These are fantastic for making dragon flies, damsels and small bugs. 

The kit come with instructions, six blocks of dense foam and three stainless cutters with their own individual cases. The cutter sizes are 3/32", 9/64", and 3/16

These cutters are designed to cut plugs up to 1 1/4" long for use in tying ants, hoppers and mayflies.  There is a learning curve involved when dealing with any new material. Foam is no different. A drill press, if one is available, will let you get the maximum utilization from a given block of foam. A hand drill should be run at top speed, or at least 1,000 RPM to cut a plug. 
  
     To start with, I recommend dipping the cutter in soapy water before attempting to cut a plug. Liquid dish soap, and a 35 mm film canister work very well for this purpose. The soapy water reduces the friction involved, which can cause twisting. Be sure the cutters do not come in contact with hard surfaces, such as wood or metal. Place the block to be cut on a soft surface, such as another block of foam, or over a hole, such as utilized with a drill press.  To remove a plug from the cutters, a round wooden toothpick works well.

name: Standard Foam Blocks
description:
This is our standard foam for forming block heads or for use with our popper cutters.  

Block Dimensions
1.6*2*4

name: Super Dense Foam Block
description:
This stuff is tuff!  This a super dense foam perfect for our cutting tools and for making block heads that hold up to multiple fish.  A nice upgrade from our standard foam blocks.

Our dense foam blocks are four inches long, two inches wide, and one and a quarter inches thick.

name: 2mm Sheet Foam
description: A very high quality closed cell foam available in numerous colors.   We use this for Spidaires and many other wiggly style of smallmouth flies.  Use Super 77 to bond a few colors together.

name: Evazote Open Celled Foam Sheets 1/8"
description: Open-celled and light weight.  Stuff floats like a cork and is much more compressable than the standard 2mm foam.  Hundreds of applications.

name: Popper Kits!
description: Making your own poppers has never been easier.  This kit includes pre-cut popper heads, kink shank popper hooks and instructions.  Simply add your own tail, legs, etc. and start fishing.

name: Cylinder Bass Popper Heads
description: 1/2 pre-cut foam heads.  Just add feathers and fur and you have a popper.  This is an assortment pack of colors with 10 heads.

name: Daves Bug Float
description:
Dave's Bug Float 

A very popular long lasting silicone gel fly floatant designed by Dave Whitlock. Just squeeze a drop onto your forefinger and liquefy by rubbing against your thumb. Wipe the liquefied floatant onto all of your hair bugs and Dahlberg divers.  Best when used sparingly. Can darken some colors slightly if used too heavily.  Comes in a 1/2 oz. squeeze bottle w/snap top.

*Guides choice for hair bugs

name: Loon Dust
description: This is a must have if you fish hair bugs.  After applying bug float and fishing for a while your divers and popping bugs will begin to sink.  Squeeze out the water and apply loon dust to the head and you are back in business.

name: Kingfisher Heavy Metal Sculpin Sz. 4
description: Is it a fly or is it a lure?  You decide.  This fly gets to the bottom fast and the tail blade gives flash as it sinks and on the retreive!

name: Shark Tooth Tippet Tamer
description:
Spend more time fishing and less time getting ready with the all-new Shark Tooth, a highly functional and easy tippet cutter. Simply slip elastic over your tippet spool and use the Tooth to cut tippet with precision. No more wasted time searching for nippers or using your teeth. The smooth cutting action leaves the perfect amount of tippet exposed and eliminates tippet waste. Reusable from spool to spool. 

Tip:  We all know maxima spools are the most unruley tippet spools on the market.  This is the perfect solution for the standard maxima spools.  A GUIDE FAVORITE!

*Small - Fits most spools from Umpqua, Cabelas and Climax  
*Large - Fits most spools from RIO, Maxima, Scientific Angler, Orvis, Cabelas, Frog Hair and Umpqua 

<object width="200" height="173"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/7wBHNa_iRWM&hl=en_US&fs=1&rel=0&color1=0x2b405b&color2=0x6b8ab6"></param><param name="allowFullScreen" value="true"></param><param name="allowscriptaccess" value="always"></param><embed src="http://www.youtube.com/v/7wBHNa_iRWM&hl=en_US&fs=1&rel=0&color1=0x2b405b&color2=0x6b8ab6" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" allowscriptaccess="always" allowfullscreen="true" width="200" height="173"></embed></object>

name: Renzetti Master Vise
description: The Master Vise is so named because it does it all. Featuring a jaw mechanism that will securely hold hooks from a #28 to a 10/0, this is the vise for bass tiers! It will hold BIG hooks and you can really crank down on it when spinning hair. The Master has the traditional rotary actuator that allows the tier to rotate the jaws by spinning the rotary arm. Without question, the Master is the most advanced and most versatile vise available today. Std features:Bobbin cradle and Black powder coated 6 x 6 x 1/2 base with Saltwater stem support and 6" long stainless steel stem.

name: Renzetti Presentation 4000
description:
If your tying needs require a variety of hook styles and sizes, you'll find unmatched versatility in the Presentation 4000. The 4000 has two rotary tension adjustments. You can use one adjustment to preset a desired level of tension for your basic tying needs. The second adjustment is used for adding tension or holding the rotary shaft in a particular desired position.

Std features: Advanced rotary actuator (the independent positioning of the fly crank arm affords total versatility in all rotary functions), Stainless steel rotary shaft and stem, Solid brass rotary head
Brass bobbin cradle support, Material clip, Military Spec anti-corrosion coating on jaws and Standard Black powder coated base with 6" long stem.

Made in the USA

name: Renzetti Presentation 2000
description:
The Presentation 2000 features Renzetti's patented adjustable jaw hinge and cam jaws, allowing the tyer to achieve True Rotary® action. This vise offers you features of the Master Series with the patented jaw hinge, the Presentation 4000 with the ratchet rotary actuator, patented anti corrosion jaws, standard pedestal base, plus a hinge stem and a 7" stem.
In addition, it is completly anodized for a more durable finish. The highly versatile Presentation 2000 is like no other vise and will quickly have you appreciating the beauty of true rotary®.

Made in the USA

name: Renzetti Traveler Pedestal Cam Jaw
description:
Our new addition to the product line offers you the great features of the Traveler Series with a longer lasting finish and a 7 inch stem for added comfort. The Traveler 2200 Series has a clear and black anodize coating. Standard features are a bobbin cradle, case harden cam jaws, rotary tension screw and a black powder coated base or a c-clamp.


Vise available also with a C-Clamp
Made in the USA

name: Renzetti Traveler C-Clamp Cam Jaw
description:
Our new addition to the product line offers you the great features of the Traveler Series with a longer lasting finish and a 7 inch stem for added comfort. The Traveler 2200 Series has a clear and black anodize coating. Standard features are a bobbin cradle, case harden cam jaws, rotary tension screw and a black powder coated base or a c-clamp.


Vise available also with a Pedestal

Made in the USA

name: Renzetti Material Clip
description:
Material Clip (Fits Traveler and Presentation vises.) This is the ideal accessory for your vise. Vise not included

Made in the USA

name: Vise Fly Rack
description:
This is the handiest little rack we have ever used.  Mounts on standard stems and will hold dozens of flies while the cement sets.

2 RACKS IN A PACK!

name: Dr. Slick Fly Tyer Tool Kit
description:
Dr. Slick Fly Tyer Tool Kit

This is the best value in the shop!  All super high quality Dr. Slick tools and a great storage container.

Kit Includes:

  • Brass Hair Stacker
  • Ceramic Bobbin
  • All Purpose Scissors
  • Bodkin
  • Bobbin Threader
  • Hackle Pliers
  • Whip Finish Tool
  • The box has ripple foam on the bottom to turn it into a fly box

name: Renzetti Soft Tool Caddy
description: Renzetti's soft foam tool caddy stores and protects every tying tool you need. Depressions allow a snug fit for almost any tool. Foam will not break down when exposed to epoxy or cement.

name: Dr. Slick All Purpose Scissors 4"
Dr. Slick Tungsten Carbide Scissors 4"
Dr. Slick Hair Scissors
description: This is the ultimate for cutting hair.  Small serations hold the hair in place and make the job simple.

name: Brassie Hair Packer
description: Unique design compresses hair and thread along the shank.

name: Griffin Hair Packer
description: One hair packer that does it all!  This one hair packer compresses any size clump of deer hair.  One packer to do it all.

name: Bone Deer Hair Comb
description: The best comb for deer hair.  This comb is anti-static because of the bone construction.  Great for removing under fur before spinning.

name: Deluxe Dubbing Spinner Set
description:
This tool comes with three different heads for creating dubbing loops.  Ball bearing head makes closing and spinning a loop a snap.This is the tool Tim uses for the Tim's Muppet to create the rabbit dubbing loop head. 

*The back end of this tool has a built in hair packer for deer hair heads.

name: Dr. Slick Bodkin
description: The ideal tool for picking out dubbing and adding glue to tight spots.

name: Dr. Slick Bobbin Threader
description: This photo shows how this tool easily threads a standard bobbin.

name: Dr. Slick Brass Whip Finisher
description: This tool is a bit tricky to learn to use at first.  This is a good video that will help better understand the use of the whip finish.

name: Dr. Slick Hackle Pliers
description: This is the easiest tool we have found to wind big hackles with.  The open loop in the center allows for easy rotation and the rubber tip grips well.

name: Dr. Slick Brass Hair Stackers
description: These are the finest stackers we can find.  Heavy polished brass with a cushion on the bottom that will not mar your bench.

name: Chernobyl Round End Body Cutters
description: These are fantastic!  The perfect answer to our selective fish in skinny water.  Make your our Chernobyl  Ants with these cutters.  Use 2mm foam and away you go.

name: Capt. Joe Blados' Crease Fly Cutter
description: This is the best way to make the Crease Fly.  This tool makes the job easy.

name: Popper Head Cutter/Maker
description:
This is by far the fastest, easiest and most economical way to make poppers.  Put the cutter in a drill and cut heads out of foam.  Each cut cylinder makes two heads when cut in half.  

The brass cutters all have a drill bit that drills a hole in the center of the plug to make shaping easy, and provides the ideal place to put the hook. 
  
They are used for making poppers for fresh and saltwater fish. The 1/4", 3/8",1/2"

name: Popper Head Shaper
description: Our shaping tools come in two sizes. The standard shaping tool comes with the standard 3/4" length center shaft for "standard" size poppers.  The smaller is perfect for panfish size and small bass bugs.  They all work with a "Dremel" type rotary tool for shaping the foam plugs.

name: Premium Deer Spinning Hair
description: Late season hides graded for length (1 1/2" to 3"), minimum underfur, good texture and straightness.  Suitable for a wide range of spinning applications. This is the most high grade stuff we can find that would be suitable for smallmouth fly shop.

name: Deer Belly Hair
description:
Deer belly hair is great for spinning and flairing. It packs tightly and makes great bass/pike popper/diver heads.  Bright vivid colors that are dyed over white belly hair.  

*Tip-

We recommend using GSP thread for all your spinning.  This thread is super tough and doesn't slice through the hair like kevlar.

name: Deer Belly Combo Pack
description: This is a great way to get your feet wet with spinning deer hair.  This is a great selection of colors to get started with.

name: All Purpose Deer
description: The highest quality hair that will meet a huge variety of tyer's needs.

name: All Purpose Deer-Bleached
description: High quality of hair that will meet a wide variety of tyers' needs.

name: Elk Rump Dyed
description: Long, course hair from the cow elk.

name: Moose Mane
description: Extremeley long (up to 8") hair which comes in various combinations of white, brown and black.

name: Moose Mane-Bleached
description: Extremely long (up to 8") hair which comes in various combinations of white, brown and black.  the bleached mane ranges from white to ginger.

name: Bucktails
description: These are prime northern bucktails!  Great colors and huge tails.  The right stuff for clousers and thunder creeks.

name: Calf Tails
description: A standard for trude style pass lakes, wulffs and streamer wings.  The right material for the wing on a clouser darter.

name: Sculpin Wool
description: Great colors and dense material for sculpins and wool heads.

name: Streamer Rooster Necks
description: Great all purpose streamer necks.  These have a million uses from popper tails to streamer wings.  Great value.

name: Chinese Strung Hackle
description: Saddle hackle is perfect for streamers, wets and popper tails.  Perfect for wooly buggers.  This is one of the top ten essential fly tying materials. A full 5-7 inches long.

name: Strung Chinese Saddle Hackle-Variant
description: Same great stuff as the standard chinese strung with one distinct difference.  These saddles are dyed over variant or grizzly feathers.  This gives them great depth and realism

name: Schlappen
description: This is feather is close to the stung chinese but much webbier.  Great feathers for bigger wings and tails.  The extra webb adds motion to all of your flies.

name: Schlappen Variant
description: This is feather is close to the stung chinese but much webbier. Great feathers for bigger wings and tails. The extra webb adds motion to all of your flies.  The Variant vesion is dyed over a grizzly or variant feather.  Very natural looking in the water.

name: Marabou-Strung
description: This is one of the most useful materials for tying smallmouth flies.  Makes great popper tails, streamer wings and leech patterns.  Flows beautifully in the water and just plain catches smallies.

name: Jail House Marabou
description: Beautifully barred marabou blood quills in all the best fish-catching colors.  Mottled colors almost always out fish solids.

name: Grizzly Marabou
description: The same as standard marabou with dark grizzly barring.  Great stuff to bring any fly to life.

name: Prime Ostrich Plumes
description: Huge plumes with long flowing herls.  These are great for tails on Murray's Strymph and Hellgramite.

name: Prime Arctic Fox Tail Pieces
description: These are by far the most prime pieces of arctic fox we could find.  This is the perfect substitute for marabou on your popper tails, wings on baitfish etc.  One of my all time favorite materials to work with.

name: Icelandic Sheep
description: Big long fibers that taper perfectly.  This is the topping material on the Bart-O Minnow.  A must have for big streamers.

name: Half Hide Rabbit Zonkers
description: Big half hides of bunny.  These are the best way to buy rabbit strips.  Straight, full and perfect.

name: Zonker Strips
description: Premium quality rabbit hides stripped in in 1/8" strips.  Excellent for bunny leeches, matuka wings or crawfish claws.

name: Zonker Strips Cross Cut
description: These rabbit strips are cut so when they are palmered, all the bunny lays back perfectly.

name: Tiger Barred Rabbit Strips
description: These are awesome!  Same movement in the water as our standard zonker strips but dyed with fantastic colors.  Two tone colors with black barring-WOW!

name: Magnum Tiger Barred Rabbit Strips
description: 1/4 in wide strips.  These are awesome! Same movement in the water as our standard zonker strips but dyed with fantastic colors. Two tone colors with black barring-WOW!

name: Barred Rabbit Zonked 1/2 Skin
description: Premium quality tanned rabbit skin pre-cut into zonker strips.  Bar dyed for a variegated appearance.  makes beautiful tow-toned zonkers, double bunnies, sculpins and Dahlberg divers.

name: Pine Squirrel Zonked Whole Skins
description: Naturally Barred.  Excellent for matukas, zonkers and streamers.  The right stuff for the slump buster.  These are a great value buying the entire skin.

name: Peacock Herl 1/4 oz.
description: A top ten essential fly tying material.  The iridescence of peacock feathers has been catching fish and fisherman for years.  Herl makes great lateral lines for the Bart-O Minnow.

name: Peacock Eyes
description: Use the eyes if you want the fullest herl you can get.

name: TMC 8089
description: This is the shops favorite all around bass hook. Straight eye, Fine wire, Wide gape, Forged, Bronze. Bass Bugs Mmmmm Hmmmm. 25 Pack *This is the hook that we use alot on the Block Head Popper, Bart-O Minnow and the Murdich.

name: TMC U-Series U 502 Bass
description: This is a brand new hook and a great price.  Our favorite hook company TMC just intruduced the new U-Series of tying hooks. Great hook at a great price.  Give them a try.

name: TMC 811S
description: Straigt eye, Standard length, Extra stong, Forged, Stainless. This is the original hook that the Murdich Minnow was tied on. The extra weight of the hook get's the fly down a bit and gives it a bit more "kick" in the water. 25 per pack

name: TMC 300
description: Streamer D/E, 6XL, Heavy wire, Forged, Bronze *25 Pack

name: TMC 5263
description: Perfect bend, Down eye, 2X Heavy, 3X long, Forged, Bronze, Nymphs & Streamers. *25 pack

name: TMC 5262
description: Perfect bend, Down eye, 2X Heavy, 2X Long, Forged, Bronze, Nymphs & Streamers. *25 Pack

name: Gamakatsu Octopus Stinger
description: This is the hook we use for a stinger hook on a fly or for tying standard smallmouth tube flies.  Try the hot colors to add a trigger to your fly.

name: Gamakatsu SL12S
description: The SL12S Trey Combs' Big Game Hooks are popular for a no-nonsense strength hook. Freshwater flytying experts use them for bass. These are high strength, plated for non-corrosion, chemically sharpened, and feature a rolled point for easy penetration, great holding, and clean releases. These hooks have an eye large enough to accommodate shock tippets. Far sharper and more durable than most stainless hooks. *10 Packs

name: Gamakatsu B10S
description: This is a great stinger hook for tying bass flies and poppers. Great for hair bugs and streamers. They are chemically sharpened with a black nickel finish. *25 Pack

name: Gamakatsu S10S
description: The Gamakatsu S10-S is a hook that works great on small bass bug sizes. The straight eye allows for a more effective hook gap. Smallmouth fly shop brought these in just for tying small poppers and Spider patterns. Straight eye, 1X Fine, Wide gape, Forged, Bronze.   25 pack

name: Daiichi 2461 Black Finish
description:
This a fantastic hook. Very versitile. This is the hook that the


Ham Sandwich

is tied on. Aberdeen bend, straight eye, 3x long shank, straight-eye, standard wire, perfect black finish

name: Mustad 3366
description: This is a classic bass hook! This is a great hook that's well known among fly tyers, especially those who tie a lot of warm water flies. And they're very ecomonical and are very tough. You can also sharpen them easily. *50 PACK!!

name: Mustad C52S BLN Stinger Deer Hair
description: This is a great all around bass bug, deer hair hook. Stinger, Deer Hair, Std. 2xl *25 pack

name: Zap A Gap Gel
description: This stuff is a must have.  We use it for attaching eyes on the Bart-O and Murdich minnow and anytime we need a good solid connection.

name: Zap A Gap
description: The original zap a gap.  This is the Medium CA+ thick gap filling formula with the accu-tip included. Perfect for securing dumbell eyes on so they will not spin.

name: Zap Goo
description: This is an all purpose adhesive and sealant that remains flexible and bonds virtually everything.

name: Z-Poxy
description: Quick set two part, 5 minute epoxy.  This is the best stuff we have found.  Clear formula, quick setting and a tough permanent bond.

name: Tear Mender
description: For glueing rabbit strips or any hides together for patterns like the double bunny.  Apply a thin layer to the leather side of the strips, let stand for 5 minutes and push them together.  The strips will be pliable and perfect every time.

name: Super 77
description: Best stuff we've found to glue foam sheets together.  Dries quick and remains pliable.  This is what Tight Lines Guide Nelson Ham uses to make his Ham Sandwich fly.

name: Exo-Flex
description: Clear drying, self-leveling, flexible body adhesive.  Ideal for baitfish patterns and for over coating stick-on eyes.

name: Softex
description: This is a 3.5 oz jar of clear, flexible and fast drying coating liquid.  It will not crack, peel or chip.  Water proof and non yellowing.  Just dip the head of your minnow patterns in to the jar to create and epoxy effect.

name: Hard as Hull Head Cement
description: This is the best gloss head cement we have ever used.  Hard as Hull is made with acrylic polymers that make it super hard.  The cap incorporates a brush applicator.

name: Painted Lead Dumbbell Eyes
description: Solid lead eye in symmetrical hour glass shape.  Narrow profile best for streamers.  Self centering and easy to tie on.  Pre-painted with black pupils.  10 per pack

name: Plain Lead Dumbbell Eyes
description: Good old fashioned lead dumbell eye.  Perfect for Clouser minnows or just adding weight to you favorite pattern.

name: Dazl Eyes
description: These perfectly symmetrical eyes are machined from solid brass.  Brass is non-toxic, and it's more durable than lead.  Their hourglass shape centers on the hook shank and helps provide secure positioning.  25 per pack

name: Real Eyes
description: Machined from solid brass in the same hourglass shape as our dazzle eyes, but with the added feature of recessed pockets.  The pockets are sized to accept either our 3D or Prismatic Tape Eyes, or you can custom paint them.  These eyes come with a sheet of prisma eyes.

name: Real Hot Eyes-Hot Orange 3/16
description: Our fantastic real-eyes with tough, baked on enamel finish.  they have machined pockets that accept paint, prismatic or 3D eyes.  We stock these in one size because this is the ones to use for most of our smallie flies.

name: I-Balz
description: I-Balz are machined from brass and use a durable enamel iris color with deep black pupils to acheive their super-realistic look. 12 per pack

name: Hot Beads
description: Our popular Brass Brite Beads with a tough, baked-on enamel finish.  These are great for deep running flies that you need a little splash of triggering color on.  We sell them only in 2 sizes.  The important ones.  25 per pack in the 3/16" and 20 in the 1/4"

name: Cone Heads 1/4"
description: Great addition to any subsurface bass fly.  We sell these painted cones only in most popular 1/4" size.   Great color and added weight will produce more big smallies.

name: Jurasic Bass Eyes
description: These are my favorite molded eyes.  They are incredibly realistic and durable.  Perfect for any baitfish pattern.  The Red/Gold look just like smallmouth eyes!  Great for baby smallie patterns. 20 per pack

name: 3-Molded Eyes
description:
Similar to prismatic eyes.  These peel and stick eyes have the added dimension of life-like countour and depths.  This is the eye we use for the Murdich and Bart-O Minnow.

*Tip-We use the 5.0 Pearl for both the Bart-Minnow and Murdich.  Use zap-a-gel to attach to the baitfish.

name: 3-D 1/2" Big Fish Eyes-Super Pearl
description: BIG 3D eye.  These are beautiful.  The same as our 3-D molded eyes but much larger.  The finish is a mirage opal pearl.  18 per pack.

name: Plastic Post Eyes
description: Life like.  Three dimensional eye.  Remove stem to mount flush for a realistic look or use the post for a more secure mounting.  18 per pack.

name: Round Rubber Legs
description: These round rubber strands make great wiggly legs.  Popper legs, Muppet legs, etc.  A million uses for a bass fly tier.

name: Tarantula Legs
description: Varigated round round rubber Legs give new life to all your fly patterns.

name: Centipede Legs-Coral Snake
description: Medium rubber legs in coral snake color.  The only company I have that offers this unique color.  Great for popper legs or jig patterns.

name: Sili Legs
description: Each package has 5 bands of 23 legs that are 5 1/2 inches long.  These make any fly come to life.  Sili legs are very soft and limber and come in tons of smallmouth catching colors.

name: Sili Legs Fire Tip
description: Same legs as our standard sili legs with a color merge.  Adds depth and pop to any fly that requires rubber legs.

name: Sili Legs Chrome
description: Sili legs with flash.  One side of these legs is metallic, giving off flash and shine in the water.

name: Fly Tails
description:
These "curly tails" tie in easily and are ideal for adding action to bass flies.  They wiggle like crazy even when they the fly is at rest. 
Size Large. 10 per pack.

name: Angel Hair
description:
ANGEL HAIR is a very fine Mylar type material. With 6-8 inch strands ANGEL HAIR can be used for those big flies.  ANGEL HAIR seems to come alive in the water and makes perfect wings on baitfish patterns.  ANGEL HAIR blends well with most other materials for dubbing and it doesn’t absorb water, so large flies dont get heavier. If you like stuff that sparkles and glitters it just doesn’t get any better than this. 

*Tip-The pearl gold angel hair is what is used in the Coffee Sparkle Minnow!  It is put in a dubbing loop and wrapped around the hook shank.

name: EP Fibers
description: Enrico Puglisi fibers are 10in length, amazingly translucent, and have an action between marabou and bucktail.  Great for minnow patterns.

name: EP Sparkle Brush
description: These have made tying patterns like the Coffee Sparkle Minnow and the Bart-O Minnow a breeze.  Pre-made dubbing loops of angel hair eliminate the need for timely dubbing loops.  These are a great value for the time savings.  Tie in the end and wrap like a hackle up the shank and you are done.  Each pack come with 6 11" brushes.

name: EP Streamer Brush with Legs
description: The addtion of micro rubber legs to these 6 10" brushes will give you incredible action.  These are the materials we use for the Men. Mud Bug.

name: Extra Select Craft Fur
description: Extra Select Craft Fur is the standard winging material for bait fish patterns. The fibers are long (aprox 4") and slinky. It comes on a hide making it easy to work with. Use this for any winging application from streamers to tube flies.   This is the stuff local guide Dave Pinzkowski uses for his pattern the Bad Hair Day.

name: Pseudo Marabou
description: The ultimate synthetic substitute for marabou.  A natural taper is achieved by pulling the fibers apart instead of cutting with scissors.  Instructions are included with each pack.

name: Fishair
description: Fishair by Hareline Dubbin is made up of very fine 70 denier fibers and has great movement in the water.  Great replacement for bucktail in the clouser minnow.  Very durable and will not foul around the hook as much as other materials.

name: Ice Fur
description: Great colors, length and sparkle make this the ultimate replacement for craft fur.  Ties in great and moves like marabou.  This is the material we use for the Murdich Minnow and Bart-O to keep the tails from fouling.

name: Crystal Splash
description: A well used slightly twisted mylar with pearlescent undertones gives patterns that subtle flash.   This is a staple pattern for warm water fly tiers.

name: Flashabou
description: Thin flexible tinsel with marabou-like action.  The most popular flash material we sell for warm water flies.

name: Holographic Flashabou
description: Supple Flashabou in 3D colors.  Holographic finish grabs lots of light.

name: Flashabou Mirage Blends
description: Mirage Blend Flashabou is a blend of Opal Mirage and Original Flashabou. Mirage Blend has great light reflection and unmatched action in the water.   Great color combinations.

name: Flashabou Magnum
description: Same great material as the standard Flashabou except it is 2 times wider, 2 times longer and 2 times stronger.  Bettter material for BIG smallmouth flies.

name: Flashabou Accent-Glow In The Dark
description: These twisted mylar strands give off awesome optical color illusions and maximum light productions, especially when charged with a light, camera flash or blacklight.

name: Krinkle Mirror Flash
description: The brightest and most reflective synthetic Mylar fly tying tinsel we've found. Creates a vibrant reflection of natural light on fly bodies. Baitfish fly patterns stand out even among schools of natural baitfish. Crinkles create the reflective sheen of scales.

name: DNA Holo Fusion
description: This Blended material is semi translucent and has a perfect mix of holo chromosommme flash and DNA fibers. Perfect for Clousers or any Baitfish / Minnow type patterns.

name: Estaz
description: A twisted core wrapped mylar imported from Europe.    It makes all kinds of patterns better like Bugger bodies.  This is the material that the head of the Murdich Minnow is constructed with.

name: Cactus Hackle
description: This makes great baitfish patterns all on its own.  Wrap this around a hook shank and presto, perfect baitfish heads.

name: Body Fur
description:
A synthetic hackle material that can be wound to make a full body that can then be trimmed to shape.

Also useful for collars and tails, it is easily marked with Prisma color pens.

name: Chenille-Medium
description: Chenille is a required material for such standards as wooly worms, wooly buggers and all sorts of streamers and nymphs.

name: Tequeely Chenille
description: This is the stuff!  Smallmouth fly shop has tracked down the source for this material.  The original Tequeely uses this specific chenille for the body.

name: Wooly Bugger Chenille
description: The densest antron chenille available with pearl mylar tinsel mixed in for just the right amount of flash.  Best we have found for tying woolies.  No bugger should be without it!

name: Trilobal Antron Chenille-Large
description: This stuff is awesome!  We only have one source to get this material.  Perfect for furling tails on worm patterns.  Very dense and thick with a touch of shine.

name: Krystal Flash Chenille-Medium
description: This chenille is made with a thinner version of our Krystal Flash.  This is amazing stuff.  Lots of uses for the warm water fly tyer.

name: Tinsel Chenille
description: Try this flashy version of chenille for the bodies of most any fly.

name: Palmer Chenille
description: A pearlescent one-sided chenille that can be palmered for tails and collars on streamers.

name: UV Polar Chenille
description: Long translucent fibers that undulate like marabou in the water.  A very unique and attractive hue is achieved by dying the UV Polar Chenille.

name: Diamond Braid
description: A great material for laying down a nice base.  The copper color is what Tim uses for the Tim's muppet body.

name: Arizona Minnow Hair
description: Subtle blend of natural and synthetic fibers. Excellent movement in the water.  Arizona blends are by far the best colors we have seen.  Fantastic tying and blending.

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: Arizona Simi Seal
description: Coarse  blend with synthetics added for flash and body.  Each pack has beautiful blends to create depth and realism.  Great dubbed on or put into a dubbing loop.

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: Crawdub Dubbing
description: A long fiber dubbing with a sparkle binder, designed to build big, tough bodies that can be picked out for a shaggy apperarance.

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: Senyo's Laser Dub
description:
new product developed with Greg Senyo for 2010-
A mix of Ice Dub and 3/4"-1" acrylic staple fibers.  This is a soft flowing dubbing that can also be used to build heads are creat a wing.

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: Ice Dub
description: This has been one of the sport’s most popular dubbings for tying both freshwater and saltwater flies. Great sparkle and dubs beautifully. This is a finely sheared mylar that is soft and dubs easily. With it's sparkle and translucence, Ice Dub works well on it's own or blends easily. One of our favorites!

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: Angora Goat Dubbing
description: Very popular as a seal substitute.  this course spikey fiber has a unique translucency good for many smallmouth patterns.  Works fantastic in a dubbing loop.

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: Uni Thread 3/0
description: UNI 3/0 Waxed Thread is a flat polyester multifilament thread that works well for covering bulky materials. Used for flies larger than size 12. It is the same material as 8/0 and 6/0 UNI-Thread, but with an increased number of filaments. 266 Denier. Breaking strength is about 40 ounces.

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: Uni Thread 6/0
description: The ever popular, great all round Uni Thread. Made of continuous Polyester filaments that are slightly bonded, but are not twisted so will still lay flat on the hook. The 6/0 is 135 denier so is roughly equivalent to UTC 140. 200yd spool.   Our favorite "all around thread"

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: Danville Flat Wax Thread
description: This is the perfect thread for Clouser Minnows.  It lays very flat and creates a nice neat tapered head.  Many of the local tyers use this as their standard for bass flies.

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: GSP 100
description: This is the best all around thread we have found for spinning or stacking deer hair.  SUPER tough and does not slice through hair like kevlar.  Much stronger and thinner than many other threads.

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: UTC Monofiliment Thread
description: Clear monofiliment thread.  The Coffee Sparkle Minnow uses this thread to create the dubbing loop.

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: Lead Tying Wire
description: This is a must have for sub-surface smallmouth patterns.  The trick is to get the fly to the bottom quick.  This wire comes in different diameters to get your fly to the right level.

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: Fly Lipps
description:
We have had these in the past and they make any fly wobble and wiggle.  A great addition to any of your old favorites.

Check out this video to see the amazing action of Fly Lipps.  
<object width="200" height="173">
<param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/wAPJiG0iQPw?fs=1&hl=en_US&rel=0&color1=0x2b405b&color2=0x6b8ab6"></param>

wmode="transparent"></embed>
</object>

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: Prisma Markers
description:
Double ended non-toxic art marker, fine point and chisel tip.  These are the markers used to color gills, add highlights and lateral lines.  

*Tip-The Murdich Minnow and the Bart-O Minnow use the cool gray color for the tops of each of these flies.

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff

name: Riendeau Ringers
description: I got these right from Craig Riendeau for his Harry Fodder.  These are the elastic bands used to create interchangable weight on flies.  These come in 20 packs and can be used all but the largest hook sizes.

categories.name: Threads, Wire, Dubbing and Other Stuff
